data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 439 believers in Rota, Northern Mariana Islands a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Rota, Northern Mariana Islands
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Rota.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Rota you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Rota to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Japanese people. Make the Japanese people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Spirit, sanctify the 439 believers in Rota and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Rota a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Rota, Northern Mariana Islands be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.
